## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G27190](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G27190)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>UCK2, UKL2</u>
- **Gene Name:** uridine/cytidine kinase 2, uridine kinase-like 2
- **Description:**   uridine kinase-like 2;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2086523
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
